Touchstone Exploration Inc.
Touchstone Exploration Inc. is a Calgary, Alberta based company engaged in the business of acquiring interests in petroleum and natural gas rights and the exploration, development, production and sale of petroleum and natural gas. Touchstone is currently active in onshore properties located in the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago. The Company's common shares are traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange and the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange under the symbol "TXP".
For further information about Touchstone, please visit
www.touchstoneexploration.com

latest.title: NOTICE OF INVESTOR MEET COMPANY PRESENTATION
latest.content:
17 Nov 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 6921H
Touchstone Exploration Inc.
17 November 2025
NOTICE OF INVESTOR PRESENTATION VIA INVESTOR MEET COMPANY
CALGARY, ALBERTA (November 17, 2025) - Touchstone Exploration Inc. ("Touchstone" or the "Company") (TSX, LSE: TXP) is pleased to announce that it will host a presentation and Q&A via the Investor Meet Company ("IMC") platform on Wednesday, 19 November 2025 at 2 p.m. GMT.
Paul Baay, Touchstone's President and Chief Executive Officer, and Brian Hollingshead, EVP Engineering and Business Development, will present an update on the Company's 2025 activity and its strategy for 2026. This will follow a presentation to analysts held in London on Tuesday 18 November 2025.
The IMC presentation is open to all existing and potential shareholders. Questions can be submitted pre-event via your Investor Meet Company dashboard up until 18 November 2025, 9:00 a.m. GMT, or at any time during the live presentation.
Investors can sign up to IMC for free and add to meet Touchstone via:
https://www.investormeetcompany.com/touchstone-exploration-inc/register-investor
Investors who already follow Touchstone on the Investor Meet Company platform will automatically be invited.
Touchstone Exploration Inc.
Touchstone Exploration Inc. is a Calgary, Alberta based company engaged in the business of acquiring interests in petroleum and natural gas rights and the exploration, development, production and sale of petroleum and natural gas. Touchstone is currently active in onshore properties located in the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago. The Company's common shares are traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange and the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange under the symbol "TXP".

latest.title: APPOINTMENT OF NOMAD AND JOINT BROKERS
latest.content:
13 Nov 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 3270H
Touchstone Exploration Inc.
13 November 2025
APPOINTMENT OF NOMINATED ADVISER AND JOINT BROKERS
CALGARY, ALBERTA (November 13, 2025) - Touchstone Exploration Inc. (the "Company")
(TSX, LSE: TXP)
is pleased to announce the appointment of Canaccord Genuity Limited ("Canaccord") as the Company's Nominated Adviser and joint corporate broker with immediate effect.
The Company also announces the appointment of Cavendish Capital Markets Limited as joint corporate broker, to work alongside Canaccord, with immediate effect.
Touchstone Exploration Inc.
Touchstone Exploration Inc. is a Calgary, Alberta based company engaged in the business of acquiring interests in petroleum and natural gas rights and the exploration, development, production and sale of petroleum and natural gas. Touchstone is currently active in onshore properties located in the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago. The Company's common shares are traded on the Toronto Stock Exchange and the AIM market of the London Stock Exchange under the symbol "TXP".
